title: Executive Order 5905-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Sarah L. Curtiss
content: Mrs. Sarah L. Curtiss may be appointed to a clerkship at $1,260 per annum in the Veterans' Administration without regard to the civil-service requirements.

Mrs. Curtiss is the widow of Dr. William W. Curtiss, formerly a commissioned officer in the Public Health Service and an employee of the Veterans' Administration. This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5905-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Sarah L. Curtiss Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361487
